remarks: Double deduction from Theorem 19.22 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2019.)
statement:
reximddv2.1 $e |- ( ( ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) /\ y e. B ) /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
